# CSE-310-projects
# Overview

{The purpose for this assignment is to learn the kotlin. In this I demonstrated the snake game I picked this game becuase I was tired of tic tac toe and wanted something slightly different}

{Provide a description: This is the snake game in the kotlin language. TO BE CLEAR! I USED THIS USING A KOTLIN IDE AND SUBMITED ON VS CODE. This is important to keep in mind since unless you have the correct kotlin extension it will not run. A similar IDE can be found here https://play.kotlinlang.org/#}
{NOTE! There are certain images such as DOT, APPLE ETC, You will need to create you own images and use your own file path in order for this to work correctly!}
{Describe your purpose for writing this software.: The purpose is to expand my programming knowledge and in this particular case about Kotlin.}



# Development Environment

{Describe the tools that you used to develop the software: The tools I used were Kotlin online IDE, and the images that came with them. }

{Describe the programming language that you used and any libraries.}

# Future Work

{Make a list of things that you need to fix, improve, and add in the future.}
* Hardest part for me was actually the IDE. I couldnt figure out how to submit it on the IDE that I used so I was told in tutoring to copy the code into VS Code and make it clear that this code will not work unless in a correct Kotlin IDE
* I had a hard time with the syntax to be honest, but I think that I could get the hang of it if I keep practicing 
* I think the hardest part of the language for me was how everything was organized, particularly the classes.
